about_the_game:
Welcome to Fantasmigon, an exciting journey into the heart of fantasy and strategy. Assemble your own band by choosing from a variety of factions, each with unique abilities and gameplay styles. Engage in thrilling turn-based battles with players from around the world, where every decision determines the fate of your group.

Game Features


Create Your Band:
Choose a faction and customize your band to suit your strategic preferences. Each character has unique abilities and specializations, allowing for diverse combinations and tactics.

Hardcore Battles:
Every battle could be your band's last. Players who lose or retreat risk losing their entire band, which can be especially painful due to the loss of developed or unlocked unique heroes.



Strategic Depth:
Immerse yourself in the tactical nuances of Fantasmigon, where every action matters and every decision influences the outcome of battles. Manage your group's resources, adapt to changing conditions, and anticipate your opponent's next move to emerge victorious.



Compete Online:
Test your skills against players from around the world in intense 1v1 or 2v2 battles. Evaluate your strategies and tactics in dynamic clashes with other players.

Embark on an Epic Adventure:
Whether you're an experienced strategist or a newcomer to turn-based games, Fantasmigon offers an exhilarating experience that will keep you coming back for more. Forge your destiny, gather allies, and prepare for battle - the world of Fantasmigon awaits!



Join us in Fantasmigon and become the hero of your own epic story!

name: Fantasmigon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)

short_description: Fantasmigon is an original turn-based strategy set in a vibrant fantasy world. Engage in thrilling battles and tactical gameplay as you lead your band of characters through challenging encounters
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, French, German, Spanish - Spain
